title: Astonish 25.4 oz. Mold Remover and Mildew Stain Blaster Spray
creator: vendor
transcripts:
Astonish mold & mildew stain blaster effectively removes mold & mildew in minutes.
Keep your Mold and Mildew Stain Blaster handy for repeated applications. It’s quick and easy to use on all areas of the bathroom where mold & mildew stain can appear.
Simply spray onto areas directly where there’s mold. Leave for 3 to 4 minutes for the solution to absorb into the mold affected areas. Next damp the area gently with a cloth and then all it takes is a wipe clean.
No mess and no stress. 
It’s great for showers too, try it around the tray area. Mold and mildew often grows in those damp areas that are often tricky to clean but with the Astonish Mold & Mildew Stain Blaster there is no scrubbing required. Just leave it to work its magic for 3 to 4 minutes then simply dab and wipe. It’s that easy.
Don’t be afraid to use it on walls and ceiling. This time spray into the cloth so that you can apply the solution without it running or dripping. Then gentle apply to the areas you need clean. Again wait a few minutes, then you’ll find the Mold & Mildew stains will wipe off with ease. 
That’s really all there is to it. 
Try it on your shower door for Astonish results.
Or on bathroom and kitchen sinks. Regular use prevents the return of mold giving you a quick, easy and long lasting cleaning solution. In other words that’s less time cleaning which sounds good to us!
And you can us it all around your house.
We’re proud to say our products are endorsed by the Vegan Society and are not tested on animals.
So don’t delay, put pay to mold and mildew stains today with Astonish Mold & Mildew Stain Blaster. Astonish, the pinnacle of cleaning.
notes: Requested SRT file from TVPage for CC. Added transcript for reference.
